title: Command Result
description: Outcome of executing a command handler, including output and status

success.description: Whether command executed successfully (must equal exitCode === 0)

output.description: Standard output content (empty string if no output)

errorOutput.description: Standard error content (null if no errors)

exitCode.description: Process exit code (0 for success, non-zero for failure)

metadata.description: Optional structured data for programmatic consumption (e.g., JSON output)
